moves.1. d4: Hello faithful hiredgun112 fans and fellow chess lovers i hope all is well.Please feel free to offer postive and negative feedback.Here we go.I open with d4
moves.2. h3: h3 i do this to stop attack on KN,taught this trick  by my friend and chess mentor trachess
moves.2... h6: I think with this h6 move he was thinking the same thing
moves.3. Nc3: Nc3 i should have developed Nf3 first
moves.3... Nf6: f6 good move he covers pawn with his Kingside cowboy
moves.4... g6 5. Bf4 Bg7: did not really understand this seems to trap kingside bishop
moves.6. Be5: try to pin N B R
moves.6... O-O: He castles do not really understand this set up.
moves.7. e3 c6: now both he and i have a good pawn chain
moves.9... h5: good pawn chain,but castle is weak i think
moves.10... Nh7: he fills hole and threatens Be5,also Bg7-h6 move would put alot of pressure on my middle
moves.11... Be4 12. Ne1: Now i have bunched everybody together,not good.
moves.13... Bg2: now i have enemy in my "camp"
moves.15... Qd7: she is not having any of it
moves.16. f4: i gave away cowboy for nothing
moves.16... Qxb7 17. gxh5: take pawn should have took Bg7
moves.17... Bxh3 18. Bf3 Bxe5: lose Be5 should have took Bg7 or cowboy at b8
moves.20. Qf2 Be6: i think he is trying to draw out my queen
moves.21. e4: I have that old bad feeling now of loss coming
moves.21... dxe4: Now Rd1 and Bf3 or threatened but Nc3 backs up Rd1 and Qf2 backs up Bf3
moves.22. Rxd7: My hand was forced i took his Queen out
moves.23... exf3: i should have took e4 instead of g6
moves.24. gxh7+: i take his cowboy and weakly threaten his Kg8
moves.24... Kxh7 25. Qh4+: going after king now,if you notice he has taken more of my pieces
moves.25... Kg6: moves king out of check notice pawns at e5 and f4
moves.28. Qh7#: cancel king like a stamp,this was a hard fought game,my biggest win in 90 days
